verses.verse: And he said<WH559> unto Moses<WH4872>, Come up<WH5927> unto the Lord<WH3068>, you and Aaron<WH175>, Nadab<WH5070>, and Abihu<WH30>, and seventy<WH7657> of the elders<WH2205> of Israel<WH3478>; and worship<WH7812> you afar off<WH7350>.
And Moses<WH4872> alone shall come near<WH5066> the Lord<WH3068>: but they shall not come near<WH5066>; neither shall the people<WH5971> go up with him<WH5927>.

And Moses<WH4872> came<WH935> and told<WH5608> the people<WH5971> all the words<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068>, and all the judgments<WH4941>: and all the people<WH5971> answered<WH6030> with one<WH259> voice<WH6963>, and said<WH559>, All the words<WH1697> which the Lord<WH3068> has said<WH1696> will we do<WH6213>.

And Moses<WH4872> wrote<WH3789> all the words<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068>, and rose up early<WH7925> in the morning<WH1242>, and built<WH1129> an altar<WH4196> under the hill<WH2022>, and twelve pillars<WH4676>, according to the twelve<WH8147> tribes<WH7626> of Israel<WH3478>.

And he sent<WH7971> young men<WH5288> of the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, which offered<WH5927> burnt offerings<WH5930>, and sacrificed<WH2076> peace<WH8002> offerings<WH2077> of oxen<WH6499> unto the Lord<WH3068>.
And Moses<WH4872> took<WH3947> half<WH2677> of the blood<WH1818>, and put<WH7760> it in basins<WH101>; and half<WH2677> of the blood<WH1818> he sprinkled<WH2236> on the altar<WH4196>.

And he took<WH3947> the book<WH5612> of the covenant<WH1285>, and read<WH7121> in the audience<WH241> of the people<WH5971>: and they said<WH559>, All that the Lord<WH3068> has said<WH1696> will we do<WH6213>, and be obedient<WH8085>.

And Moses<WH4872> took<WH3947> the blood<WH1818>, and sprinkled<WH2236> it on the people<WH5971>, and said<WH559>, Behold the blood<WH1818> of the covenant<WH1285>, which the Lord<WH3068> has made<WH3772> with you concerning all these words<WH1697>.
Then went up<WH5927> Moses<WH4872>, and Aaron<WH175>, Nadab<WH5070>, and Abihu<WH30>, and seventy<WH7657> of the elders<WH2205> of Israel<WH3478>:

And they saw<WH7200> the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>: and there was under his feet<WH7272> as it were a paved<WH3840> work<WH4639> of a sapphire stone<WH5601>, and as it were the body<WH6106> of heaven<WH8064> in his clearness<WH2892>.
And upon the nobles<WH678> of the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> he laid<WH7971> not his hand<WH3027>: also they saw<WH2372> God<WH430>, and did eat<WH398> and drink<WH8354>.

And the Lord<WH3068> said<WH559> unto Moses<WH4872>, Come up<WH5927> to me into the mountain<WH2022>, and be there<WH5414>: and I will give you tablets<WH3871> of stone<WH68>, and a law<WH8451>, and commandments<WH4687> which I have written<WH3789>; that you may teach them<WH3384>.
And Moses<WH4872> rose up<WH6965>, and his minister<WH8334> Joshua<WH3091>: and Moses<WH4872> went up<WH5927> into the mountain<WH2022> of God<WH430>.

And he said<WH559> unto the elders<WH2205>, stay<WH3427> you here<WH2088> for us<WH7725>, until we come again unto you<WH175>: and, behold, Aaron and Hur<WH2354> are with you<WH4310>: if any man<WH1167> have any matters<WH1697> to do<WH1167>, let him come unto them<WH5066>.
And Moses<WH4872> went up<WH5927> into the mountain<WH2022>, and a cloud<WH6051> covered<WH3680> the mountain<WH2022>.

And the glory<WH3519> of the Lord<WH3068> lived<WH7931> upon mountain<WH2022> Sinai<WH5514>, and the cloud<WH6051> covered<WH3680> it six<WH8337> days<WH3117>: and the seventh<WH7637> day<WH3117> he called<WH7121> unto Moses<WH4872> out of the middle<WH8432> of the cloud<WH6051>.

And the sight<WH4758> of the glory<WH3519> of the Lord<WH3068> was like devouring<WH398> fire<WH784> on the top<WH7218> of the mountain<WH2022> in the eyes<WH5869> of the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>.

And Moses<WH4872> went<WH935> into the middle<WH8432> of the cloud<WH6051>, and gat him up<WH5927> into the mountain<WH2022>: and Moses<WH4872> was in the mountain<WH2022> forty<WH705> days<WH3117> and forty<WH705> nights<WH3915>.
